channel.description: Recent content in SSL on tothemoon's blog

item.title: SSL Configration in Ec2 Namecheap
item.description: In this section, I will show you how to config the SSL in Namecheap and AWS EC2. Preparation Buy a domain name Buy a SSL certificate Generate a key and csr file Config the SSL in Namecheap Config the SSL in AWS EC2 ubuntu Buy a domain name Go to Namecheap and buy a domain name. Buy a SSL certificate Go to Dashboard -> SSL Certificates -> Buy SSL Certificates.
